data.name: Newton and the Apple Tree - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This is the soundtrack for Newton and the Apple Tree.
These sound files come in .flac and .ogg format, and will be downloaded to the main game's install folder.
You can find a game's install folder by right clicking on it in your Steam library, selecting "Properties", selecting the "Local Files" tab, and clicking "Browse Local Files..."

Track Listing


1. Good Ol' Happy Days
2. NO TENBRIDGE, NO LIFE
3. British Moon
4. No Matter the Regret...
5. Crashing like a Wave
6. Celestial Beacon
7. English March
8. Noblesse Oblige
9. Don't turn away... ~Now's the Chance~
10. Dreamed Landscape
11. With a Loving Embrace
12. Song of Wind
13. Skyhigh Promise
14. Song of Wind ~Ending Edition~
15. MISS YOU APPLE

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible sound card
